password.title: Password
password.description: If you lose access to your school email address, you'll be able to log in using your password.

verification.title: 2-step verification
verification.description: Add an additional layer of security to your account during login.

support.title: Support access
support.description: Grant Notion support temporary access to your account so we can troubleshoot problems or recover content on your behalf. You can revoke access at any time.

logout.title: Log out of all devices
logout.description: Log out of all other active sessions on other devices besides this one.

delete.title: Delete my account
delete.description: Permanently delete the account and remove access from all workspaces.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize how Notion looks on your device.

open-on-start.title: Open on start
open-on-start.description: Choose what to show when Notion starts or when you switch workspaces.

open-links.title: Open links in desktop app
open-links.description: You must have the Mac or Windows app installed

set-timezone.title: Set timezone automatically using your location
set-timezone.description: Reminders, notifications and emails are delivered based on your time zone.

cookie.title: Cookie settings
cookie.description: Customize cookies. See Cookie Notice for details.

view-history.title: Show my view history
view-history.description: People with edit or full access will be able to see when you've viewed a page. Leran more.

discover-profile.title: Profile discoverability
discover-profile.description: Users with your email can see your name and profile picture when inviting you to a new workspace. Learn more.

mobile.title: Mobile push notifications
mobile.description: Receive push notifications on mentions and comments via your mobile app

slack.title: Slack notifications
slack.description: Receive notifications in your Slack workspace when you're mentioned in a page, database property, or comment

activity.title: Activity in your workspace
activity.description: Receive emails when you get comments, mentions, page invites, reminders, access requests, and property changes

digests.title: Email digests
digests.description: Receive email digests every 8 hours for changes to pages you're subscribed to

announcements.title: Announcements and update emails
announcements.description: Receive occasional emails about product launches and new features from Notion

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language used in the user interface.

start-week.title: Start week on Monday
start-week.description: This will change how all calendars in your app look.

name.title: Name
name.description: You can use your organization or company name. Keep it simple.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Upload an image or pick an emoji. It will show up in your sidebar and notifications.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Pages shared to web will be under {{site}}. Anyone with an allowed email domain can join this workspace via {{link}}.

public.title: Public home page
public.description: Access your public home page via {{site}}.

analytics.head: Analytics
analytics.title: Save and display page view analytics
analytics.description: People with edit or full access will be able to see how many views a page has. If this is turned off, page views will not be stored for all pages in {{workspace}}.

invite.title: Invite link to add members
invite.description: Only people with permission to invite members can see this. You can also generate a new link

upgrade.title: Upgrade to create groups
upgrade.description: Upgrade to the Plus Plan to set up groups and control permissions from the share menu.

sso.title: Upgrade for SAML SSO & more admin tools
sso.description: The Business Plan includes single sign-on to manage employee access at scale, private teamspaces to collaborate on sensitive docs, and more.

scim.title: Upgrade for SCIM, advanced security & more
scim.description: The Enterprise Plan allows you to automatically provision users and groups, and gain more visibility and controls across the workspace.

publish.title: Disable publishing sites
publish.description: Disable the Share to web option in the Share menu on every page in this workspace.

edit.title: Prevent members from editing the Workspace section
edit.description: Disable the ability for members to create, move, reorder, and delete top-level Workspace pages.

duplicate.title: Disable duplicating pages to other workspaces
duplicate.description: Prevent anyone from duplicating pages to other workspaces via the Move To or Duplicate To actions.

export.title: Disable export
export.description: Prevent anyone from exporting as Markdown, CSV, or PDF.

access.title: Allow page access requests from non-members
access.description: This allows anyone with the link to a page to request access. Workspace members can always request access.

invite.title: Disable members inviting guests to pages

guest.title: Allow members to request adding guests
guest.description: Requests must be approved by a workspace owner.

member.title: Allow members to request adding other members
member.description: Members can submit requests to admins to add more members.

user.title: Allow any user to request to be added as a member of the workspace
user.description: If enabled, users with teamspace invite links can submit requests to admins to be added as members

domains.title: Verified domains
domains.description: Verify ownership of an email domain to access advanced security features including single-sign on.

creation.title: Workspace creation
creation.description: Customize who can create new workspaces.

claim.title: Claim workspaces
claim.description: Claim workspaces created by users with a verified domain or require owners to use an external domain.

user.title: User management
user.description: These settings apply to all users with a verified domain, even if they are not a member of this workspace.

dashboard.title: Managed users dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage and view users that are using your verified domains.

profile.title: Allow managed users to change profile information
profile.description: Control if managed users can change their preferred name, email address, and profile photo.

external.title: External workspace access
external.description: Control if managed users are able to join workspaces that aren't owned by your organization.

support.title: Prevent managed users from granting support access
support.description: Control if managed users can enable support access on their accounts.

session.title: Session duration
session.description: Control how long your managed users can be logged in for before they must re-authenticate.

logout.title: Log out all users
logout.description: Force log out all managed users and require them to re-authenticate.

password.title: Reset passwords for all users
password.description: Force reset the passwords for all managed users and require them to create a new one the next time they log in.

saml.title: Enable SAML SSO
saml.description: Workspace members can log in with SAML SSO if their email address uses a verified domain.

login.title: Login method
login.description: Customize how users access workspaces that have SAML SSO enabled. Workspace owners can always log in with a password.

creation.title: Automatic account creation
creation.description: Automatically create Notion accounts for new users who log in via SAML SSO.

linked.title: Linked workspaces
linked.description: This SAML SSO configuration applies to the following other workspaces. Contact support to add or remove a workspace.

scim.title: SCIM tokens
scim.description: Generate a token to configure SCIM.
